hi, this page is about turtles. big ones, small ones, here, there. pretty much used only as a test page, or a sandbox. Note to self: create a sandbox.
sorry, I just have to add some special stuff to test the GET ajax junk: `~!@I guess it didn\\\\\\\'t get very far... not even line breaks....\\\\\\\"\\\\\\\';;:[]\\\\\\\\{}|,./<>?=- _)(*
on the other hand, POST handles line breaks nicely!
ha ha - just testing stuff
next to do: take care of all those slashes...

hi, this page is about turtles. big ones, small ones, here, there. pretty much used only as a test page, or a sandbox. Note to self: create a sandbox.

just some more testing... this time to make sure everything is smooth. to this end, I am temporarily removing the ajax functionality, in favour of good old-fashioned GET. once the basic user functions are in, I'll re-add them.
